part3_header1: Start making a difference now—and far into the future
part3_para1: Each Smart Forest has a **‘planting prescription’**. This is the unique mix of species that’s right for the local climate, soil conditions, drainage, and land history. This optimal habitat maximizes the positive impacts the Forest will make, including carbon sequestration, oxygen production and water absorption.

part4_para1: Don’t just care for the environment. Prove it.
part4_para2: If ESG is not a box you’d like to tick, but a change you’d like to make, work with us.
part4_para3: An investment in a Corporate Smart Forest is an opportunity for corporations across Canada to reimagine their sustainability strategy and invest for long-term ROI. This is a turnkey and sustainable approach for corporations to meet net-zero and ESG commitments, offering:
part4_box1para: Calculate your net-zero carbon footprint and determine the size of forest needed to offset your emissions.
part4_box2para: A secure, customized portal to watch your forest grow and build engagement campaigns that bring the journey to life for shareholders, employees, and customers.
part4_box3para: Demonstrate your commitment to sustainability and the significance of your impact with a no clear-cut guarantee on each Smart Forest. Keep stakeholders informed with an annual report on performance.
part4_quote1para: “We need 50 shades of green to catalyze and support all companies towards net zero… Companies will need to show how they plan to meet their net-zero targets through the appropriate mix of emission reductions and credible carbon offsets, including nature-based solutions such as reforestation.”
part4_quote1title: UN Special Envoy for Climate Action and Finance

part4_pointspara1: Drive immediate CO2 reductions from the atmosphere

part4_pointspara4: Boost the economy through the creation of local jobs
part4_pointspara5: Add shareholder value by strengthening long-term financial and operational performance

part5_para1: Study climate action in real time.
part5_para2: Student Smart Forests protect our planet and teach us how to tackle climate change.
part5_para3: From climate strikes to online activism, students are taking action on climate change. With their future at stake, they’re looking for meaningful ways to steer things back on course.
part5_box1para: A Smart Forest offers an opportunity to educate students about environmental stewardship with digital tools to track its effects in real time.
part5_box2para: An easy-to-execute program that taps into students’ interests and demonstrates its immediate and long-term benefits.
part5_box3para: The School Smart Forest™ Ambassadors program names the environmental stewards who have created a more sustainable future for all.
part5_quote1para: “Time is much shorter than we think. Failure means disaster. The changes required are enormous and we must all contribute in every part of our daily life. Especially us in the rich countries where no nation is doing nearly enough.”
part5_quote2para: “[Younger generations] have a different kind of investment in the future…A lot of the adults in the world aren’t going to be here by the time some climate conditions start taking effect in the world.”
part5_header2: Students make great teachers. Give them a forest to manage.
part5_para4: Spark a life-long connection to the environment and teach valuable skills.
part5_pointsheader: Raising funds to build a forest is:
part5_pointspara1: **Healthy.** Zero calories and carbon-free. No sales of chocolate bars, cookie dough or other consumable items.
part5_pointspara2: **Sustainable.** No packaging or unused products. Forest stewardship reduces the carbon footprint of all Canadians.
part5_pointspara3: **Safe, Secure and Easy.** All transactions are online, No door-to-door sales, cash handling, or post-fundraising deliveries required.
part5_pointspara4: **Impactful.** Supports the health of the planet, scholarships, student employment, school programs, and community needs.
part5_pointspara5: **Empowering.** Enables students to take action against the devastating effects of climate change, inspires leadership and builds organizational skills.
part5_header3: Get involved in the future today.
part5_para5: Work with our team to establish a secure online program to sell seedlings for your School Forest. Your school keeps 50% of proceeds to support school initiatives.

part7_para1: Work together to protect future communities.
part7_para2: Every Canadian can take action on climate change.
part7_para3: Each plant, animal, and microbe in the forest contributes something unique and essential to the ecosystem: a forest is a community that is greater than the sum of its parts. This simple, but powerful fact inspired the Communal ForestTM initiative. It’s an opportunity for every individual in Canada to play a part and help build a forest.
part7_quote1para: “What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.”
part7_quote2para: “[Younger generations] have a different kind of investment in the future…A lot of the adults in the world aren’t going to be here by the time some climate conditions start taking effect in the world.”
part7_header2: A forest is a community. And a community can build a forest.
part7_para4: Communal Forests are created by the thousands of Canadians who are here for change.
part7_pointspara1: **Accessible.** Anyone can take part without walking out the front door.
part7_pointspara2: **Accountable.** Canada’s Forest Trust issues annual audits and reports so you can see the impact your forest makes.
part7_pointspara3: **Trackable.** See maintenance, preservation, growth measurements, and more through the online portal and dashboard.
part7_pointspara4: **Forever.** Every communal forest will be protected by insurance and a no clear-cut guarantee.
part7_header3: Join your fellow Canadians and make a change for the better.
part7_para5: Anyone can do their part to offset their carbon footprint—large or small. Use our calculators to see what kind of impact you can make. Once a Communal Forest is started, our online portals will show you how it’s progressing.
